mapper.select: SELECT brchNo, theater_name, city_idx FROM theater
SELECT city_name, city_name_e, city_idx FROM city

SELECT DISTINCT m.movie_nameK, movie_code, movie_runtime, CASE (SUBSTR(movie_rated, 1, 2)) WHEN '전체' THEN 'all' ELSE substr(movie_rated, 1, 2) END AS movie_rated FROM screen s JOIN theater t ON s.screen_theater_idx = t.theater_idx JOIN schedule sc ON s.screen_idx = sc.sche_screen_idx JOIN movie m ON m.movie_code = sc.sche_movie_code WHERE brchNo = #{brchNo} AND sche_date = CURDATE() AND sche_start_time > CURRENT_TIME()

SELECT t.city_idx, t.theater_idx, t.theater_name, t.brchNo, m.movie_code, m.movie_nameK, m.movie_runtime, m.movie_rated, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT s.screen_name) AS screen_name, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT sc.sche_date) AS sche_date, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT TIME_FORMAT(sc.sche_start_time, '%H:%i')) AS sche_start_time, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT TIME_FORMAT(sc.sche_end_time, '%H:%i')) AS sche_end_time, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT screen_total_seat) AS screen_total_seat FROM screen s JOIN theater t ON s.screen_theater_idx = t.theater_idx JOIN schedule sc ON s.screen_idx = sc.sche_screen_idx JOIN movie m ON m.movie_code = sc.sche_movie_code WHERE brchNo = #{brchNo} AND sche_date = CURDATE() AND sche_start_time > CURRENT_TIME() GROUP BY t.city_idx, t.theater_idx, t.theater_name, t.brchNo, m.movie_code, m.movie_nameK, m.movie_runtime, m.movie_rated, s.screen_name
